text: 7:14 Aisaia 9:6; Matyu 1:23; Luk 1:31; 1:34Kamaghɨn, Ekiam uabɨ ababanir tam nɨn akagham. Ababanir kam kamakɨn. Amizir gumazitam ko akuizir puvatɨzim navim asegh, otaritam bategham. Eghtɨ me ziar kam Emanuel a darɨgham.”7:14 Hibrun akamɨn, ziam Emanuel, an mɨngarim kamaghɨn ghu, “God e ko iti.”
